casebody.data:
Russell Anderson v. F. Francis D’Addario

King, C. J., Alcorn, House, Thim and Ryan, Js.

Argued October 9 decided October 9, 1969 Arthur Levy, Jr., with whom, on the brief, was Irwin E. Friedman, for the appellant (defendant). Howard F. Zoarski, for the appellee (plaintiff). Per Curiam.

The trial court reached a permissible result on conflicting evidence.

There is no error.
